name: Inside Me
description: "Inside Me" is a top-down shooter in which you play as one of nanorobots embedded in the human body to fight infection.
minimum_requirements: 最低: OS: Windows XP プロセッサー: 1.7 GHz Dual Core メモリー: 2 GB RAM グラフィック: GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 4850  or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 ストレージ: 2 GB 利用可能 サウンドカード: DirectX Compatible Sound Card 追記事項: Required display aspect ratio is 16:9 or 16:10
recommended_requirements: 推奨: OS: Windows 7 プロセッサー: Intel Core i3 3.07 GHz メモリー: 4 GB RAM グラフィック: GeForce 250 GTS or Radeon HD 5750 or better DirectX: Version 10 ストレージ: 2 GB 利用可能 サウンドカード: DirectX Compatible Sound Card 追記事項: Required display aspect ratio is 16:9 or 16:10

reviews.review_text: Very polished game and difficult at that! Once you get the hang of it and figure out what sort of tactic works best for you it's smooth sailing from there, while i don't like the fact that you can't shoot and only your bots can, i don't feel like it is much of a bother.   I highly recommend this game.
